title: Make-up free Kate Beckinsale cuts a casual figure in gym wear as she takes a stroll around LA
text:
She recently wrapped filming on action movie, Jolt.

And Kate Beckinsale was making the most of her free time as she enjoyed a sunny stroll around Los Angeles on Wednesday.

Clad in gym wear, the 46-year-old actress looked low key but lovely as she made the most of the balmy weather.

Low-key outing: Kate Beckinsale was making the most of her free time as she enjoyed a sunny stroll around Los Angeles on Wednesday

Going make-up free for the outing, Kate allowed her natural beauty to shine through, with her hair swept away from her flawless features and styled in a messy bun.

The mother-of-one sheathed her sensational figure by donning a white vest top that she layered beneath a cream cardigan.

She teamed the garment with a pair of loose fitting grey tracksuit bottoms, whilst she slung a large black handbag over one shoulder.

Kate was no doubt making the most of her downtime before the promotional tour for Jolt, which will be released next year, where she plays a homicidal bouncer with anger issues.

Keeping it casual: Clad in gym wear, the 46-year-old actress looked low key but lovely as she made the most of the balmy weather

Kate hit the headlines earlier this year for her now-ended romance with 25-year-old Saturday Night Live funnyman Pete Davidson.

Pete was hot on the heels of his high-profile broken engagement to pop star Ariana Grande, who recently released the smash hit breakup album Thank U, Next.

Kate and Pete's relationship went public when they were spotted kissing in the stands at a hockey game in New York City on March 2.

Au naturel: Going make-up free for the outing, Kate allowed her natural beauty to shine through, with her hair swept away from her flawless features and styled in a messy bun

Pete then moved on with Margaret Qualley, but this week it was reported he has ended his romance, less than two months after confirming the relationship.

According to Us Weekly, Pete and Margaret, 24, still 'remain friends', even though they have gone their separate ways.

Pete and Margaret first got romance rumors started back in August, when it was reported the pair had already been seeing each couple for a couple of months.

'They've been seeing each other for a couple of months and Margaret is really excited about him,' a source told Us Weekly at the time.
description: She recently wrapped filming on action movie, Jolt.  And Kate Beckinsale was making the most of her free time as she enjoyed a sunny stroll around Los Angeles on Wednesday.
